players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am innocent and need your help"
You: "I am innocent and need your help"
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I will kill again tonight"
Diana: "I am innocent and need your help. I saw Charlie talking to Alice before she died, maybe he knows something."
You: "I am the detective and I have evidence that Charlie is the mafioso. I suggest we discuss this further tonight."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
